a.n: Ilove: Alex is Fawx & Tommy Pistol

p.k: Tech nerd Tommy (Tommy Pistol) has created a revolutionary algorithm for connecting people and has enlisted his best friend and gaming partner Lina (Alexis Fawx) to be his business advisor. After the launch, the new app becomes even more successful than they could have imagined but soon nefarious f-rces emerge to take advantage of the naive coder and alienate him from his partner. Sex, lies and big tech collide in iLove.
